title: help me SOME ONE TOOK MY ACCOUNT AND WANTS 2000RP
body:
MY ACC IS eretro42 i usually dont trust these things but riot said a riot employee will never ask for a password
i didnt even give my oassword i thought i was talking to my friend donald ut next thing you know my acc got hacked
someone please help he want 2000rp for the acc back riot plz help im crying inside plz

replies.body: Someone is seriously trying to hold your account for ransom?  No worries, we can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will help get your account back into your hands.  We'll see you there, so don't worry!

SOMEONE PLEASE HELP

PLEASE
RIOT
PLEASE
